content.text:
# IFF World Ranking

The IFF World Ranking is a ranking of the national teams of member countries of the International Floorball Federation.
Ranking system
The ranking is based on the standings of the two most recent Floorball World Championships. That is 2022 and 2024 for men and 2021 and 2023 for women.
The ranking is also used to determine the seeding of the teams for the next Floorball World Championships and other competitions like World Games.
National champions from the top four ranked countries compete at the Champions Cup.
